skill.name: Miracle Cure
skill.value: Restores 1347/1607 HP to all allies and cures them of all negative status effects.

ability.name: Like a Blade of Magic (Lv. 30)
ability.value: Normal attacks sharply decrease the current target's ATK speed.

ability.name: Alchemist's Achievement (Lv. 85)
ability.value: Sharply increases all allies' crit DMG.
